title: Bell announces offering of MTN Debentures
description: Bell Canada (Bell) today announced the public offering in Canada of Cdn $1.0 billion aggregate principal amount of MTN Debentures pursuant to its medium term notes (MTN) program.
content: This news release contains forward looking statements For a description of the related risk factors and assumptions please see the section entitled Caution Concerning Forward Looking Statements later in this news release MONTR AL March PRNews chars
